name: The Unknown
startIntroPart1: Where are we? What is this place?
startIntroPart2: A collection of strange people from another world obsessed with knowledge. you now lead them in this strange world
declaringWar: We are here to take your knowledge
attacked: Very well, we wanted to know more anyways
defeated: It seems we were never welcomed into this world.
introduction: You seem very interesting. We hope to share knowledge with each other
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, we gained enough knowledge anyways.
tradeRequest: We hope this is a worthwhile trade.
